Estrenos_Disney.Pelicula:

Pinocho 31/01/1940 Ben Sharpsteen (Supervisor), Hamilton Luske (Supervisor), William "Bill" Roberts, Norman Ferguson, Jack Kinney, Wilfred Jackson and T. Hee

Fantasía 06/11/1940 James Algar, Samuel Armstrong, Ford Beebe Jr, Norman Ferguson, Jim Handley, Thornton Hee, Wilfred Jackson, Hamilton Luske, Bill Roberts, Paul Satterfield y Ben Sharpsteen.
Lee Blair, Elmer Plummer, Phil Dike

Dumbo 16/10/1941 Ben Sharpsteen, Norman Ferguson, Wilfred Jackson, William "Bill" Roberts, Jack Kinney y Samuel Armstrong
Joe Grant, Dick Huemer y Otto Englander
Walt Disney Frank Churchill y Oliver Wallace

Bambi 12/04/1942 David Hand, James Algar, Bill Roberts, Norman Wright, Samuel Armstrong, Paul Satterfield, Graham Heid
Perce Pearce, Larry Morey, Vernon Stallings, Melvin Shaw, Carl Fallberg, Chuck Couch y Ralph Wright
